file.name: security-scheme-http-bearerFormat.yaml
file.content:
cases:
- name: valid HTTP/bearer security scheme
  input:
    openapi: 3.0.0
    info: { title: "", version: 1.0.0 }
    paths: {}
    components:
      securitySchemes:
        myScheme:
          type: http
          scheme: bearer
  output:
    equal: null
- name: valid HTTP/bearer+bearerFormat security scheme
  input:
    openapi: 3.0.0
    info: { title: "", version: 1.0.0 }
    paths: {}
    components:
      securitySchemes:
        myScheme:
          type: http
          scheme: bearer
          bearerFormat: Bearer
  output:
    equal: null
- name: valid HTTP/basic security scheme
  input:
    openapi: 3.0.0
    info: { title: "", version: 1.0.0 }
    paths: {}
    components:
      securitySchemes:
        myScheme:
          type: http
          scheme: basic
  output:
    equal: null
- name: invalid HTTP/basic+bearerFormat security scheme
  input:
    openapi: 3.0.0
    info: { title: "", version: 1.0.0 }
    paths: {}
    components:
      securitySchemes:
        myScheme:
          type: http
          scheme: basic
          bearerFormat: Bearer
  output:
    length: 1
    match:
    - message: "should NOT have a `bearerFormat` property without `scheme: bearer` being set"
      path: [components, securitySchemes, myScheme]
